SEARCH

Package main.java.neat.config

package main.java.neat.config
  • Class
    Description
    ActivationConfig
    Configuration class for neural network activation functions.
    ActivationConfigBuilder
    Builder class for creating and configuring ActivationConfig instances.
    AggregationConfig
    Configuration class for neural network aggregation functions.
    ConfigFactory
    Factory class for creating standard NEAT configurations.
    NEATConfig
    Configuration class for NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
    NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY
    Defines the initial connectivity patterns for creating new genomes.
    NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION
    Defines the probability distribution types used for initializing weights, biases, and other numeric parameters.
    NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION
    Defines the optimization direction for fitness evaluation.
    NEATConfig.SELECTION_TYPE
    Defines the selection methods used for choosing parent genomes during reproduction.
    NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION
    Defines how to calculate the fitness of a species from its member genomes.
    NEATConfigBuilder
    Builder class for creating and configuring NEAT algorithm parameters.
